data.title: Casey Stewart Photography
data.meta_description: Casey Stewart Photograph professional Commercial, business, corporate, product, conference, events, hotel, hospitality, PR, media, digital photography
data.meta_site_name: Casey Stewart Photography Wedding Photographer Scotland UK
data.text:
COMMERCIAL PHOTOGRAPHY

I am a creative and experienced commercial photographer, providing Business, Corporate, Product, Conference, Events, Hotel, PR & Media photography but will consider all projects as I do enjoy a variety of work to keep the creative juices flowing. So whether you are running a charity event, looking for head shots for meet the team or want to showcase your venue / business / services Casey Stewart Photography has got it covered.

£135 1 HOUR SESSION - ENQUIRE NOW!

Taking photographs that gets your message across

In this digital age it's vital that businesses maintain a professional image online, this can often mean new and refreshing images are required for websites, blogs and social media as well as advertising and PR. You will get the photos and images your business needs to sell and promote your business, products, services and people. We will work directly with you – or your representative – to ensure that you get photographs that are both creative and of genuine use to your business.

Your customised quote

I usually find it best to give you a personalised quote and I am happy to provide you with a full breakdown of rates that will clearly explain the options that best suit your exact needs. What I need to know before I can provide an accurate quote is:

What exactly do you want me to photograph?

Where is the shoot is taking place? A rough idea is fine so I can determine travel costs if appropriate

Will the shoot involve multiple sites or products? Roughly how many?

Will the job require more than one visit? –If so roughly how many and over what time scale?

What are you going to use the final images for? ie web, print, editorial, general promotion.

What's the deadline is for getting the job done for you and delivering the images?

If you have a set budget for the project please advise.

How much does it cost?

Commercial Tariff 1st Hour Additional hours Half day Full day Basic £135 £65 £315 £520 Standard £165 £85 £380 £600

A half day is typically 3 hrs and a full day typically 7 hrs inclusive of travel time. Expenses will be detailed on your quote. If you are in Central Scotland then no additional charges will apply, otherwise travel will incur a further charge to be confirmed at the time of booking and hotels charged at cost.

What you receive

My expertise and time – your costs are based on how long it takes to shoot your images

The photographs taken – I don’t charge for additional shots later

Processing is included in the price with all images being edited to provide you with high resolution images on a USB stick

A license/the right to use your images

Public Liability Insurance

GET IN TOUCH!
